سؤال قد يبدو سؤالاً بائساً :D
عايز انزل ويندوز 10 و فيجوال ستوديو 2015  و مش عايز اقعد فاتح اللابتوب 4 ايام عشان كده :D
هل فيه فى القاهرة نت كافيه بسرعات عالية يخلصلى الموضوع ده فى ساعتين !!
و لو عملنا ابستراكت للسؤال .. ليه مافيش مكان فيزيكال للجروب كوو وركينج سبايس مثلا نتقابل فيه و يكون فيه كوونيكشان عالية و هارد ديسك اكسترنال نجيب منه الحاجاات دى علطول :D

posts.description: If you are looking to create a responsive website design, watch this course to discover how to make your website more readable and efficient across various screen sizes and devices.

posts.message: Shameless self plug: I got a technical article published :D
posts.caption: toptal.com
posts.description: What if you know what you're searching for ahead of time, but you don't know where you're searching for it until the last minute? Toptal engineer Ahmed Al-Amir breaks down a neat and efficient algorithm for searching through large volumes of text in just such a scenario.

posts.message: I've got a simple question, I hope someone has the answer for that beforehand. Is there a way to convert MHTML web archives to HTML using PHP, since the support for MHTML pages isn't that great?

posts.message: Good jump start for CQRS & DDD
posts.caption: cqrs.nu
posts.description: The ideas around CQRS are fascinating, but different enough from the way we do conventional development that some questions come up again and again. This page collect a number of such questions that we've encountered, and attempts to give accurate and satisfactory answers to them.
